name: Locomotea
description:
The next anticipated entry in the CurdleJam Afroduck saga, Locomotea has you help Afroduck out of a real pickle. His tea is too darn hot and needs cooling down ASAP!

Entry for Curdle Jam#16 themed 'Blowing Off Steam'.

Use Up/Down or W/S to manouvre Afroduck's steam train through his local park. You will gain speed over time to help cool off the tea with eco-friendly wind power. Just make sure to dodge obstacles and park dwellers, lest you spill your tea!

All Code, Art, Music and Design created by Mr_Afroduck
